entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 04:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow changing to ice pellets then changing to rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
